settings.subtitle: Everlasting vitality and positivity
settings.desc: Anxi Tie Guanyin Oolong leaves sourced from family-owned premium tea farms in the area known as "Tea Heaven".
settings.nutrition: We believe in only offering the best quality tea to our customers.
settings.te_copy: Genki Forest's fresh brewed and lightly sweetened Ran tea is made with the finest whole leaf Oolong tea, crafted by tea masters living in Anxi, China. With a thousand year history, the semioxidized tea is created from a traditional process passed down from generation to generation. It varies in flavor and aroma, making it unique from green and black teas.

Genki Forest's fresh brewed and lightly sweetened Ran tea is made with the finest whole leaf Oolong tea, crafted by tea masters living in Anxi, China. With a thousand year history, the semioxidized tea is created from a traditional process passed down from generation to generation. It varies in flavor and aroma, making it unique from green and black teas.

settings.title: Get Your Genki. Get Your Good Vibes.
settings.infoblock: The Chinese character (Qi) means both bubbles and "positive energy". Genki's sublimely sweet sparkling water and teas liven up your day with their delicious and refreshing taste. Embark on a delightful journey through a world of flavor.

settings.title: Taste Wanderlust
settings.subtitle: Unleash the daydreamer, the curious adventure seeker, the explorer in you. With just one sweet sip of our globally-inspired flavors, imagine all the places you can go.

settings.title: No Ordinary Sparkling Water
settings.copy:
Discover our sublimely sweet and flavor forward sparkling water that actually tastes good. A tasteful journey in global flavor and tiny bubbles that lift you up.
Always with zero calories, zero sugar and zero fat.

settings.title: Adventures in Oolong Tea
settings.copy: Explore a new world of flavor with fresh brewed Ran Teas. We select the finest tea leaves in China and brew with local tea masters to honor oolong tea's ancient heritage. Rooted in rich tradition yet crafted with new fruit flavors, we deliver a modern oolong tea experience like no other.

settings.review1:
I’ve been on a diet for some time, This has no sugar and satisfies my sweet tooth! I love this product as a diet soda. Please never stop with this, I love it!!!"
- Alyssa M.
settings.review2:
Want to kick soda to the curb? The taste is great without the sugars, it’s like nothing you ever taste it. Refreshing and not like other 0 calorie waters. Trust me, I say try it."
- Ana G.
settings.review3:
Taste refreshing, especially good for after working out, I like it a lot because it’s sugar free also the oolong flavor is very strong, definitely recommend!"
- Cara B.

settings.title: At Genki Forest, we believe that taste matters
settings.subtitle: Discover exotic flavors from around the world that deliver unexpected journeys in taste

settings.title: Get your Genki. Get your good vibes
settings.infoblock: It all started with wanting to create a drink experience that delivered a taste of something special beyond the senses. Genki Forest was born to provide fun-loving and adventurous fans with guilt-free, refreshing beverages that inspire the spirit and the imagination. We're driven by the concept of "Genki," a word that not only means bubbles, but also good vibes and positive energy. Genki is all about inspiring good vibes with sweet and flavor forward beverages that liven up your day.

settings.title: A new kind of sparkling water
settings.copy: We approach sparkling water differently from other brands. It all starts and ends with the flavor experience. From the first sip, our sparkling water is full of powerful flavor and sublime sweetness - a fizzy beverage reminiscent of soda but with zero sugar and zero calories. Infused with exotic flavors from around the globe, you're whisked away on a journey of taste and more.

settings.title: An ancient tea with a modern twist
settings.copy: Genki Forest's Ran tea serves up a modern twist with a lightly sweetened, fresh and fantastic flavor that takes you on an Oolong adventure. With a thousand year history, the semi-oxidized tea is created by tea masters in Anxi, China and by a traditional process passed down from generation to generation. With natural antioxidants, Oolong tea is thought to be beneficial for health and well-being.

settings.title: Taste wanderlust
settings.subtitle: Explore the world of Genki with all of its magical, mystical and fantastic flavor. Unleash the daydreamer, the curious adventure seeker, the explorer in you. Don't be afraid to just drink in the moment, and dare to find your flavor. With just one sip, imagine all the places you can go.
